short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for detecting if a site was built using Squarespace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension detects if a site you are visiting was made using Squarespace. The extension icon will light up when you are visiting a Squarespace site. 

Clicking the icon displays the site's template ID and Squarespace version.
